message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I know it's worth a lot to me, but I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $8,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,500.  This price still allows me to make a reasonable profit, and I believe it's fair considering the value you place on the product. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $9,000. Can you consider this price?
